titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the week of April 24-29, 2023, as "Small Businesses in For-Hire Transportation Week".
Expressing support for the designation of the week of April 24-29, 2023, as "Small Businesses in For-Hire Transportation Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Small Businesses in For-Hire Transportation Week and recognizes the efforts of the industry's small businesses.
